name: 2Moon
description: TO THE MOON (2MOON) is a blockchain game that is simple, recreational, and friendly to everyone.
payDisclosure: TO THE MOON is a recreational and friendly game for all participants. With the ultimate mechanism of free of charge and absolute entertainment, players can gain treasures in the game. Because of the desire to make a full nature product of game and decentralization of blockchain, we called that as GameDeFoc, instead of GameFi.
